name: foxtail
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of several different kinds of grass that have long, cylindrical flowers and are sometimes grown to feed animals such as cows and sheep: Foxtail looks like barley but is in fact a grass. In some parts of the world, foxtail grasses are grown as a food crop.
More examplesFewer examplesHe lay back among the long stalks of foxtail grass.Foxtail seeds can cause fatalities to dogs when they reach internal organs.
